page.title: 12New Milton Station
page.content: { New Milton Station}was built in 1886 and greatly influenced the growth of the town.Today the station is served by trains to and from{Waterloo}and {Weymouth.}On most working days there are hourly trains in both directions. From {New Milton}the price of a single adult fare is {Â£11.60 }to {Waterloo} and {Â£5.90 }to {Weymouth.}The journey from {New Milton}to{Weymouth}takes about {one hour}and a{half.}The journey from {New Milton }to { {Waterloo}takes about {one hour}and {three quarters.}
